name: 2DPlateformerWizards
description:
This game is made from the inspiration from the tale of the three brothers written by the author of the book harry potter, which is about three wizards that concur against death, they are three brothers and only the third brother manages to beat death.

I have made some twists to the story as well! This platformer game is about his journey, collecting a wand, stone and the invisibility cloak, and finally beating death. Careful of the obstacles on the way!!
